ProjectTitle: Integrated design and joint optimization of on-demand and regular public transport
InitialFeedbackHistory: 18/03/2024 [REDACTED] please list all the data that you will use in the table, including existing data and processed data files, codes, scripts etc; note that also the data that is not your own needs management, are you sure publicly available data will remain available and unchanged during and after your project or will you keep a copy; when you receive data, will there be a sharing agreement, for which projects are you allowed to use the data, can you keep the data after the project or share it with colleagues? [REDACTED] [REDACTED] way to share your data is to use a repository, e.g. RDR https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr, this could be easier since once you deposit your data the RDR team will take care of the preservation whereas you have to maintain a website yourself. [REDACTED] to choose a data license so others know how to reuse your data, eg CC-BY so your data can be reused but you have to be acknowledged/cited, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/license-selection 18/03/2024 [REDACTED] please list all the data that you will use in the table, including existing data and processed data files, codes, scripts etc; note that also the data that is not your own needs management, are you sure publicly available data will remain available and unchanged during and after your project or will you keep a copy; when you receive data, will there be a sharing agreement, for which projects are you allowed to use the data, can you keep the data after the project or share it with colleagues?
